title: All Ball - Doug Reflects on the 20th Anniversary of the Oklahoma State Plane Crash with Former Teammate Brian Montanati
itunes:title: All Ball - Doug Reflects on the 20th Anniversary of the Oklahoma State Plane Crash with Former Teammate Brian Montanati
description:
In this episode, Doug remembers the the 2001 Oklahoma State team plane crash and 10 that died with his former teammate Brian Montanati and how it has impacted how both live their lives going forward. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
